allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix icon garbage collection and optimize dialog icons

Changes:
- Store PNG icon references to prevent garbage collection \(app._icon_images\)
- Dialog reuses main window icons instead of reloading
- Adjust window width to 210px for optimal titlebar space
- Keep DPI awareness at Per-Monitor V1 \(V2 caused text blurriness\)

This ensures icons stay sharp throughout app lifecycle and in dialogs.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
